Params[3]: Greetings everyone, we finally meet.
It's you...
You're the Ascendant I've been chasing after!
Correct.
I thought you were... a good guy.
Haha.
How regrettable it must be, then.
Honestly, I do not dislike people like you, people who think in black and whites.
If it weren't for the Punishing Virus, we might have even been good friends...
Shut up already!
You're the cause of all evil!
Kamui rushes forward, swinging a heavy blow aimed at Roland—
—but was dodged easily.
Is this all you've got, Kamui?
Dammit... How could I have not realized at that time...
Because you, are a simpleton, my little boy.
I won't let you hurt people any longer!
Kamui! Don't go by yourself—
I'll be there for you soon, my dear Gray Ravens!
This here is between me and... him.
You didn't just forget my name, did you?
Ahaha...
Roland handily parries Kamui's blows while speaking with the Gray Raven members.
You all, where are your manners? We have guests.
They couldn't hear you though, sadly. Side effect of the virus, all the work of yours truly.
Such an incompetent watchdog, what a waste of my expectations...
